Pre-Game Insights: Uganda is set for their ICC T20 World Cup debut against Afghanistan on June 3, 2024.
Uganda's team has been prepared by South African tactician Lawrence Mahatlane and his assistant Jackson Ogwang.
Uganda defeated Zimbabwe in the qualifiers to secure their World Cup spot.
Uganda's coach Abhay Sharma emphasized the importance of processes and situations in preparation.
Captain Brian Masaba wants the team to focus on playing the match rather than the teams.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain prevented Uganda from doing any skill work on the Sunday before the match.
Uganda's team met Team Australia, which boosted their morale.
